Gra jest okej. Raz gra się lepiej, raz gorzej. Jako, że mapy są losowo generowane, czasami na start killer/survivor są w pupce. Aktualizacje, nowe perki i killerzy są balansowane pod nowych graczy, dlatego na wyższym (ukrytym) MMR zazwyczaj wygrywają survivorzy. Połączenie OP perków z ludźmi, którzy grają ekipą - nie wygrasz. Zrobienie jednego generatora bez żadnych dodatków i pomocy zajmuje 80 sekund. Jako killer trafisz na pechową plansze, średniego survivora i gg.

Społeczność gry jest.. inna bądź co najmniej dziwna. 

Grając survivorem:
1. Używasz jakiekolwiek przedmioty, zwłaszcza latarkę - jesteś toxic
2. Spamujesz bind od kucania - toxic
3. Robisz generatory od razu po załadowaniu gry (jedyny cel w grze) - toxic
4. Robisz generator przy killerze - toxic
5. Nie pomagasz innym survivorom, niezależnie od sytuacji - toxic

Grając jako killer w zasadzie cokolwiek zrobisz lub nie, to i tak jesteś toxic :D

首先呢，祝黎明杀机制作组和黎明杀机的玩家五周年快乐。
说说这个游戏吧。上头，真的很上头，非对抗性的玩法这么多年了依然是那个味道，还是一样的紧张刺激。我大概是在出小丑的时候入的坑，更早的时候知道这个游戏大概是直播的时候偶然瞄见的。中途A了一段时期，断断续续的玩着，最近又下回来玩。黎明杀机的联动也使得这个游戏焕发了第N春。
再聊聊被诟病的几点，第一呢就是喜闻乐见的匹配系统（bushi。他游戏的对抗模式导致幼屠在面对红紫段车队的时候显得格外无力，特别是技能还没齐全的时候，人类的话还算一般，遇到会玩点的屠夫不至于被爆杀，修修机当当蘑菇，保个段还是没问题的。第二就是玩家之间的这个嘲讽问题，比如屠夫守尸，人类开门蹲起不走，《人类给屠夫订的一百条规则》等等。对此我只想说，门口蹲一下吃个离别刀走了就算了，出来能不能看一眼计分表？抓技能都没全的黄白段壮丁屠夫还要公屏noob ez，属实有点优越过头了。还有就是屠夫守尸，官方已经用扣分的方法来限制屠夫守尸。恶意守确实恶心人，但是你1212蹲起蹲起被人逮着挂地下室静止隐身守尸了，出来还要diss一下属实不得hours。对抗贴脸守尸那就只能不去管，然后其余人修机，最差也是个二死二跑。
ps：其实守尸机制可以改成在以上钩的人类为半径的一定范围内，如果长时间只有屠夫和上钩人类对屠夫实行掉分并且期间无法获得分数。让屠夫至少动起来，哪怕你近点巡逻也能给人类一点救的机会。
pss：以前有遇到过一个屠夫，属实阴间玩法，走过去给人类堵在墙角然后挂机不动，挂到其他人都跑完然后终局杀死他。（因为他不出刀人类不受伤就不能无视和屠夫之间的单位碰撞所以人类被卡身位一直卡到死）

DBD Pros and Cons (IMO)

Pros:
-Great asymmetrical idea for a game.
-When you are new to this game, it feels like you're in the "horror" genre.
-There are cool powers and unlockables for Killers and Survivors.
-Sometimes you actually play in a match where everyone is just having fun (win, lose, or draw). It was challenging, but there were no toxic SWF, flashlight clickers, tunneling killers, hackers, or campers.

Cons:
-It's 4 vs. 1 and if you are playing against an efficient SWF (with comms) there's no chance for the average Killer to win.
-Survivors complete their objective with relative ease (just hold down the mousepad). While Killers have to put in a bit more effort to complete objectives. It takes more skill to find and catch and hook a survivor than it does to hold down M1 to complete the gens in 4 minutes.
-The DBD community is all over the place. Hackers and toxic people are not few or far between. They can make you not want to play this game at all.
-With 1,000+ hours in this game, it's not scary (unless you go against a stealth Killer and you legit didn't know they were coming for you). But most of the time you're just doing gens, moonwalking, and looping the Killer. It's more skillful, and less scary because (at least when I play Survivor) I almost feel invincible. The Killer can't catch me unless I mess up my looping. Somehow that doesn't seem right, and it's definitely not scary at all.

Overall:
- I give it a 3 / 5 stars

De certa forma, o trabalho de um crítico é fácil. Nos arriscamos pouco, e temos prazer em avaliar com superioridade os que nos submetem seu trabalho e reputação.
Ganhamos fama com críticas negativas, que são divertidas de escrever e ler, mas a dura realidade que, nós críticos, devemos encarar, é que no quadro geral, a mais simples porcaria, talvez seja mais significativa do que a nossa crítica.
Mas, há vezes em que um crítico arrisca, de fato, alguma coisa, como quando descobre e defende uma novidade.
O mundo costuma ser hostil aos novos talentos, às novas criações. O novo precisa ser incentivado.
Ontem à noite eu experimentei algo novo; um prato extraordinário de uma fonte inesperadamente singular. Dizer que tanto o prato, quanto quem o fez, desafiam minha percepção sobre gastronomia, é extremamente superficial.  Eles conseguiram abalar minha estrutura.

If you are up for a team based game or if you want to try to kill everyone, this game has both and you will have fun trying to hunt down the survivors or evade the killer. Sometimes you will win and sometimes you will lose, it is all based on luck and a little bit of skill.

Muito bom e divertido de se jogar sozinho e com amigos, bom tutorial e simulação de gameplay, killers variados e divertidos de jogar. O maior problema desse jogo é o matchmaking, em que frequentemente players rank amarelo caem contra times full rank vermelho, tornando algumas partidas chatas, além de alguns erros na hit box de alguns killers. Apesar desses pontos, continua a ser um excelente jogo e altamente recomendável para jogar horas e sorrir com os amigos.
When I am going to go play this game, I tell my husband I am off to commit murder and mayhem.  10/10, would keep putting survivors on meat hooks again.

Would highly recommend you buy this game, as well as 2-4 characters while they are on sale. I would recommend you buy leatherface, ghostface, michael myers, and the hag. (as well as the survivors that come with those corresponding killers, so buy the pack they come with, and not just the individual character.)

Do not spend real life money on characters that can be bought with in game currency (because who does  that?)

I played for 69 hours

After 140 hours of this game I thing it's definitely worth picking up. While the base game gives you some options to play as both a killer and survivor it is worth spending time to pick up new characters or money (if the character is licensed). The licensed character crossovers are very good. The only problem I personally have with this game is it's the same thing ever time. Only 2 ways to escape and that is how it has been since release. Hoping they add more game changing mechanics (probably won't but) than just character changing mechanics. Also it's a very fun game to play with friends whether you play SWF or custom game. Also the leveling up player, leveling up characters, and leveling up ranks are all pretty good in my opinion. You can choose who to level up which is always nice and you can learn and get better by playing with higher ranks and learning patters, loops and more ways to play. Also the cosmetics are pretty dope.
